intro: Gonzalagunia tonduzii, commonly known as the Tonduzii mistletoe, is a hemiparasitic plant that grows on the branches of its host trees. Gonzalagunia tonduzii plays a role in the ecological dynamics of its habitat by influencing host tree health and providing food for certain bird species.
